stories.Title: Webb brings new discoveries
stories.Description: Observation with the telescope revealed that methyl cation (CH3+) is present in a young star system in the Orion Nebula, a key element in the formation of complex carbon-based molecules.
stories.Tweet: Webb brings new discoveries 📦 Observation with the telescope revealed that methyl cation (CH3+) is present in a young star system in the Orion Nebula, a key element in the formation of complex carbon-based molecules. #NASA https://www.nasa.gov/feature/goddard/2023/webb-makes-first-detection-of-crucial-carbon-molecule

stories.Title: Explore the mysteries of the cosmos
stories.Description: NASA and ESA venture on a journey into the unknown with Euclid and Roman. Together, these powerful space telescopes will unveil the enigma of dark energy and the universe's accelerated expansion.
stories.Tweet: Explore the mysteries of the cosmos 📦 NASA and ESA venture on a journey into the unknown with Euclid and Roman. Together, these powerful space telescopes will unveil the enigma of dark energy and the universe's accelerated expansion. #NASA https://www.nasa.gov/feature/goddard/2023/nasas-roman-and-esas-euclid-will-team-up-to-investigate-dark-energy

stories.Title: The chatbot race continues
stories.Description: China's advancements in the AI field continue to make waves as Baidu's AI chatbot, the Ernie Bot, has reportedly surpassed OpenAI's ChatGPT in several tests. Who's taking the prize home?
stories.Tweet: The chatbot race continues 📦 China's advancements in the AI field continue to make waves as Baidu's AI chatbot, the Ernie Bot, has reportedly surpassed OpenAI's ChatGPT in several tests. Who's taking the prize home? #ai https://www.techtimes.com/articles/293079/20230627/china-baidu-claims-ernie-ai-chatbot-outperforms-openai-chatgpt.htm

stories.Title: All eyes set on Gemini
stories.Description: DeepMind's upcoming chatbot, built on AlphaGo techniques, promises game-changing problem-solving capabilities and advanced text analysis.
stories.Tweet: All eyes set on Gemini 📦 DeepMind's upcoming chatbot, built on AlphaGo techniques, promises game-changing problem-solving capabilities and advanced text analysis.  #google https://techcrunch.com/2023/06/26/deepmind-claims-its-next-chatbot-will-rival-chatgpt/

stories.Title: EU's commitment to safety
stories.Description: In their pursuit of responsible AI, the EU and its partners have launched four new testing and experimentation facilities, to ensure the safe integration of AI technologies in society.
stories.Tweet: EU's commitment to safety 📦 In their pursuit of responsible AI, the EU and its partners have launched four new testing and experimentation facilities, to ensure the safe integration of AI technologies in society. #ai https://thenextweb.com/news/eu-launches-new-testing-facilities-develop-responsible-ai

stories.Title: AI: Open or closed?
stories.Description: The rise of open-source AI brings exciting possibilities, but we must navigate the challenges responsibly by prioritizing strong management and ethical practices.
stories.Tweet: AI: Open or closed? 📦 The rise of open-source AI brings exciting possibilities, but we must navigate the challenges responsibly by prioritizing strong management and ethical practices. #ai https://www.axios.com/2023/06/26/ais-next-battle-open-closed-chatgpt

stories.Title: Starship lights its fire
stories.Description: Ship 25, the upper-stage prototype for Starship, underwent a successful static fire test on Monday. Bringing us a step closer to the anticipated launch of the most powerful rocket.
stories.Tweet: Starship lights its fire 📦 Ship 25, the upper-stage prototype for Starship, underwent a successful static fire test on Monday. Bringing us a step closer to the anticipated launch of the most powerful rocket. #spacex https://www.space.com/starship-ship-25-first-static-fire-video

stories.Title: Tesla's plans take another turn
stories.Description: The leak of negotiations surrounding a potential factory in Valencia, Spain has caused the company's anger and subsequent abandonment of the project.
stories.Tweet: Tesla's plans take another turn 📦 The leak of negotiations surrounding a potential factory in Valencia, Spain has caused the company's anger and subsequent abandonment of the project. #tesla https://electrek.co/2023/06/27/tesla-got-very-angry-leaked-valencia-project-reportedly-killed-factory/

stories.Title: Paving the way for greener mobility
stories.Description: Stellantis aims for hassle-free electric vehicle charging with its new "Charging & Energy" business, which will provide EV drivers with access to a wide range of charging points in Europe.
stories.Tweet: Paving the way for greener mobility 📦 Stellantis aims for hassle-free electric vehicle charging with its new "Charging & Energy" business, which will provide EV drivers with access to a wide range of charging points in Europe. #stellantis https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/stellantis-aims-relieve-charging-anxiety-with-new-service-ev-users-2023-06-27/

stories.Title: An eye-catching approach
stories.Description: Brilliant Labs defies the norm of bulky headsets by introducing Monocle, a compact AR lens that is designed to be clipped onto any eyewear or held to the eye.
stories.Tweet: An eye-catching approach 📦 Brilliant Labs defies the norm of bulky headsets by introducing Monocle, a compact AR lens that is designed to be clipped onto any eyewear or held to the eye. #startups https://techcrunch.com/2023/06/27/brilliant-labs-puts-ai-in-front-of-your-eye-with-its-tiny-open-source-ar-lens/

stories.Title: A light in the blackout
stories.Description: During Reddit’s blackout, Google’s Perspectives covers the need for authentic answers by integrating discussion forums and videos from social media into search results.
stories.Tweet: A light in the blackout 📦 During Reddit’s blackout, Google’s Perspectives covers the need for authentic answers by integrating discussion forums and videos from social media into search results. #google https://www.cnbc.com/2023/06/26/google-execs-hope-new-search-feature-will-help-amid-reddit-blackouts.html

title: Meet DeepMind’s Gemini, China plans to win the AI race, EU’s approach to responsible AI
